page.title: 16TRADE EVENJOBB & KINNERTON
page.content: EVENJOBB HAS A GROCERY/POST OFFICE, STOCKING BASIC REQUIREMENTS & NEWS- PAPERS.SENIOR CITIZENS CAN OBTAIN THEIR STATE PENSIONS HERE.TOURISTS ARE AMAZED TO SEE THAT OUR SHOP STILL HAS ITS ORIGINAL STONE FLOOR AND WOODEN FITTINGS.FOLLOWING THE DEATH OF THE PROPRIETOR THE GROCERY BUSINESS IS SUSPENDED & THE POST OFFICE MOVED ELSEWHERE, BUT THIS IS ONLY TEMPORARY. KINNERTON CATTLE MARKET WAS OPENED IN 1983.AUCTIONS OF STORE CATTLE ARE HELD FORTNIGHTLY & SALES OF FATSTOCK PERIODICALLY.THE MARKET CAN HOLD 18OO HEAD OF CATTLE & 38OO SHEEP IN MODERN PENS.THESE PURPOSE BUILT BUILDINGS HAVE GOOD FACILITIES & ARE USED BY FARMERS FROM A WIDE AREA. PEOPLE THROUGHOUT THE AREA ARE ABLE TO OBTAIN SUPPLIES OF BREAD & GROCERIES FROM A MOBILE SHOP,WEEKLY.
